data.name: Corpse Box Racers
data.detailed_description:
Corpse Box Racers can be played in two different game modes. Campaign (1-4 players) and Tournament (2-4 players)

Tournament
In this mode you and your friends compete against each other in a series of fast-paced challenges. Where at the end, the player who won the most challenges is crowned the winner.
These Challenges can be anything from throwing skee-ball with your corpse, getting the furthest up a hill while avoiding big bouncy balls, or racing through a short race track to be the first at the finish line.

Campaign
The Campaign mode acts as a linear set of levels where you try to race as fast as you can through increasingly difficult levels.
Early Access releases with Part 1, Heaven. which includes 24 levels that when completed gets unlocked for Tournament mode.
data.about_the_game:
Corpse Box Racers can be played in two different game modes. Campaign (1-4 players) and Tournament (2-4 players)

Tournament
In this mode you and your friends compete against each other in a series of fast-paced challenges. Where at the end, the player who won the most challenges is crowned the winner.
These Challenges can be anything from throwing skee-ball with your corpse, getting the furthest up a hill while avoiding big bouncy balls, or racing through a short race track to be the first at the finish line.

Campaign
The Campaign mode acts as a linear set of levels where you try to race as fast as you can through increasingly difficult levels.
Early Access releases with Part 1, Heaven. which includes 24 levels that when completed gets unlocked for Tournament mode.
data.short_description: What if, when people die, they do go to heaven... only they're still dead and their bodies are now used as competitors in tournaments?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10 Yosemite
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Core i5
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu/Arch based kernal 5.4
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 570
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu/Arch based kernal 5.4 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
